1. Government AI copyright plan suffers fourth House of Lords defeat  BBC
  2. Starmer rejects fresh attempt to protect artists against AI  The Telegraph
  3. Nick Clegg says asking artists for use permission would ‘kill’ the AI industry  The Verge
  4. Artistic property is not theirs to nick - 2 Jun 2025 - The Big Issue Magazine  Readly | All magazines - one magazine app subscription
  5. UK culture secretary updates creative industries on AI strategy: “We have heard you loud and clear”  Screen Daily

item.title: OpenAI's 'smartest' AI model was explicitly told to shut down — and it refused - Live Science
item.description:
1. OpenAI's 'smartest' AI model was explicitly told to shut down — and it refused  Live Science
  2. Opinion | AI Is Learning to Escape Human Control  WSJ
  3. How far will AI go to defend its own survival?  NBC News
  4. Why AI acts so creepy when faced with being shut down  Business Insider
  5. Straight Out of a Sci-Fi Movie: An AI Managed to Rewrite Its Own Code to Prevent Humans From Shutting It Down  The Daily Galaxy
